name: Power Party
description:
This game has been built for Extra credits Game Jam 4 #extragamejam with all the extra challenges accepted!

It is not a full gaming experience, instead I learnt and applied game development techniques of making a game work like scriptable objects, pixel perfect camera, swapping out sprites, etc.

Instructions:

1. Only the 3-Player version has been "completed", so select Start P3 and the game initiates. Decide in advance who will be P1, P2 or P3.
2. The players are taking turns in order. When it is your turn, your avatar has a countdown clock next to it and 3 tiles. You can swap a tile from your set with one in the big triangle by selecting one of both then click "Swap". Mind the clock or you'll skip your turn.
3. After swapping tiles, the connected cities take damage. If your city takes damage twice, you're out.

The game is over if there is only 1 player left, indicated by text (Winner!). If more than 1 players are out in the last turn, everybody will be declared as winner.
